des:
With the Legrand Home skill use your voice to control your smart lighting control accessories enabled with HomeKit technology.

Works with the following Legrand lighting control accessories: HKRL10xx (switch), HKRL50xx (Tru-Universal dimmer), HKRP10 (plug-in switch) and HKRP20 (Tru-Universal plug-in dimmer). 
 Use your voice to turn lights on/off, dim to a specific level, and control multiple devices with a favorite scene like "good night." 
 No separate hub required. 
 To get started:
1. Download the free Legrand Home mobile app. 2. Register an account within the app
3. In the Alexa app, go to "Skills & Games" and search for "Legrand Home Skill", click "Enable" and link your account.
4. After discovering your devices, they will appear under "Smart Home" in your devices list in the Alexa app.
5. Then you can start controlling your devices with your voice.
